items.sentence: The authorities have already made some arrests.
I don't remember telling you to close the door.
I don't know how far it is to Boston from here.
How dare you speak to me in that tone of voice!
How dare you talk that way in front of my wife!
How dare you enter my house without permission!
Tom won't like it if I call him after midnight.
If I call Tom after midnight, he won't like it.
How many planets are there in our solar system?
There are many black cats hiding under the bed.
People wear masks to prevent getting a disease.
There are four pieces of furniture in the room.
When I was young, we used to swim in the river.
In the summer I like to swim naked in the pond.
The village had more than a thousand residents.
Six men came forward to volunteer for the work.
You can't have a rainbow without a little rain.
Once a species goes extinct, it's gone forever.
When was the last time you ironed your clothes?
Nothing interesting happens in this small town.
